categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "snowtrooper4life" was the online alias of a human snowtrooper who served the First Order. In 34 ABY, snowtrooper4life traveled to Crait, expecting there to be snow, only to discover that Crait's landscape was covered in salt. Because of this, snowtrooper4life posted a one-star review of Crait in Yoda's Guide to the Galaxy, a book written by the Jedi Master Yoda during his exile on Dagobah.
snowtrooper4life was first mentioned in the 2021 non-canon reference book LEGO Star Wars Yoda's Galaxy Atlas.
